name: valyy
description: Search and extract content using Valyu's DeepSearch API. Access academic papers, web search, structured data, and AI-powered content extraction.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for information across web, proprietary sources (academic papers, datasets), or both. Returns ranked results with content, relevance scores, and metadata.

searchType.description: Search scope: 'web' for web search, 'proprietary' for academic/datasets, 'all' for both, 'news' for news articles

maxNumResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

includedSources.description: Specific sources to include (URLs, domains, or dataset IDs like 'valyu/valyu-arxiv')

excludeSources.description: Sources or domains to exclude from search results

startDate.description: Start date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.description: End date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format

fastMode.description: Fast mode for quicker but shorter results

tools.name: contents
tools.description: Extract clean, structured content from web pages with optional AI-powered summarization and data extraction. Supports up to 10 URLs per request.

urls.description: Array of URLs to process (maximum 10 URLs per request)

summary.description: Enable AI summarization. Set to true for auto summary, false for raw content

summaryInstructions.description: Custom instructions for AI summarization (alternative to summary: true)

extractEffort.description: Extraction thoroughness: 'normal' (fast) or 'high' (more thorough but slower)

responseLength.description: Content length per URL: 'short' (25k chars), 'medium' (50k), 'large' (100k), 'max' (no limit)

tools.name: answer
tools.description: Get AI-powered answers to questions using Valyu's Answer API. Searches for relevant information and provides comprehensive answers with citations.

searchType.description: Search scope: 'web' for web search, 'proprietary' for academic/datasets, 'all' for both, 'news' for news articles

systemInstructions.description: Custom system-level instructions (max 2000 chars) to guide the AI's response style or focus

countryCode.description: Country code filter for search results

includedSources.description: Specific sources to include in the search

excludedSources.description: Sources to exclude from the search

startDate.description: Start date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.description: End date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format

fastMode.description: Fast mode for quicker but shorter results

tools.name: deepresearch_create
tools.description: Create a new DeepResearch task. DeepResearch is an AI-powered research agent that conducts comprehensive, multi-step research with citations and cost tracking.

includedSources.description: Specific sources to include in the research

tools.name: deepresearch_status
tools.description: Get the current status of a DeepResearch task, including progress, output, and metadata.

tools.name: deepresearch_wait
tools.description: Wait for a DeepResearch task to complete, polling until it reaches a terminal state (completed, failed, or cancelled).

environmentVariables.name: VALYU_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Your Valyu API key. Get one at https://platform.valyu.ai
